alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:01PM EST until January 07 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio, southwest Virginia, northeast Kentucky and most of central and southwestern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills tonight into Friday morning are likely to drop into the single digits above zero at lower elevations, and into the single digits below zero at some higher elevations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
